ygData.subject: misc -- again
ygData.msgSnippet: 1) Heh, actually... I m terrible about knowing zones and quests. I -- however-- know a lot about group dynamic. For the most part, I group with anyone well.
ygData.messageBody:
1) Heh, actually... I'm terrible about knowing
zones and quests. I -- however-- know a lot about group
dynamic. For the most part, I group with anyone well.
Although chanters and bards increase my effectiveness 10
fold. At level 30-- had a bard and chanter in my group.
I was the only healer (there was a paly but he was
too busy to heal-- puller and all). I healed, DS, and
buffed without any problems with only a 128 wisdom. I
was in Skyshrine. Easy exp for me. Chanter mezzed
adds-- me and bard slowed runners. <br><br>2) I do need
more experience in knowing my zones though. I always
get lost. =-) I'm too used to being able to gate out
of problems now. LOL.<br><br>3) There are always
people bickering and stuff. But that happens. Everyone
has bad days. I try to empathize. Perspective is
everything. Sometimes-- yeah... you've got rude ppl. But a
lot of times, it's just perspective and maybe
someone's having a bad day or wasn't thinking when they
said something. Goodness knows I've done that.
=)<br><br>4) Dang, between being sick, school, and work... EQ
dang it... not enough time for it. LOL. That and doing
VLARP, and sheesh. Anyhoo.... (darned bronchitis. Still
not sure if I should even attempt going to work and
to speak on the phone. Telephone tech support stinks
when having Bronchial issues)<br><br>Everyone be well
and enjoy the game! It's still a ton of fun and
Lucian's a few months away. Whoo. =)<br><br>shooman
out<br>Fatedhue, Druid of Drinal--<br>Tribunal of the
Antiquities<br>Circle of the 36th-- going on<br>25 days of play time.
Egads! Grin.<br>One point from mastering Baking...
sigh/grin
